title: Ep. 675 Did They All Get Played?
description:
In this episode I address the recent comments by Hillary Clinton about why she lost. I also discuss the revelations that Russian oligarchs are connected to numerous players in the Obamagate spying scandal. Finally, I address the economic absurdity of liberals' love affair with inflation. 
 
Democrats are in a panic because the House report has determined there was no “collusion.”
 
Hillary continues the bizarre blame game for her electoral loss. 
 
Some GOP insiders are worried about the direction of the White House.
 
A fascinating piece uncovering more connections between Russians and Clinton-connected individuals.
 
Was Jim Clapper the source of a devastating leak?
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved

In this episode I address the recent comments by Hillary Clinton about why she lost. I also discuss the revelations that Russian oligarchs are connected to numerous players in the Obamagate spying scandal. Finally, I address the economic absurdity of liberals' love affair with inflation.    Democrats are in a panic because the House report has determined there was no “collusion.”   Hillary continues the bizarre blame game for her electoral loss.    Some GOP insiders are worried about the direction of the White House.   A fascinating piece uncovering more connections between Russians and Clinton-connected individuals.   Was Jim Clapper the source of a devastating leak?   Copyright CRTV.
